title: New Zealand mother pulls toddler away from charging ram
text:
Tense footage shows the moment a quick-thinking mother pulls her child from the path of a charging ram.

The video, taken in Upper Hutt, New Zealand, was filmed by the child's aunt who gasps in shock as the ram approaches the boy at speed.

The nearby mother swept the boy to safety before she and her sister laugh in relief following the October 28 incident.

Off in the distance the ram can be seen charging at the boy. The mother realises just in time, lifting the child by his arms

The clip begins with the child walking up to a rooster with his mother following close behind.

Off in the distance the ram can be seen charging at the boy. The mother realises just in time, lifting the child by his arms.

The child's aunt screams out in shock and says 'Oh my God' as the ram dashes past the boy.
description: The video, taken in Upper Hutt, New Zealand, was filmed by the child's aunt who gasps in shock as the ram approaches the boy at speed. The boy's mother swept him to safety just in time.
